Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to unauthorized rental car use
Summary: Amends provisions relating to unauthorized rental car use; authorizes a rental vehicle company to regain custody of a rental vehicle which is not returned at the end of the rental agreement including repossession.
LawCode: Amd ยง396-z, Gen Bus L; amd ยง165.05, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law and the penal law, in relation to unauthorized rental car use
